data.title: Great free attraction
data.text:
This is a great free attraction if you have some time to kill. It is located near the Louisiana Boardwalk, Horseshoe Casino and Margaritaville Resort. It was originally Bossier City's courthouse and city jail.

Today, you can check out local and regional artists' canvas and photo art. Karen LeBeau is the April featured artist. Her works are very folksy and snapshots of her hometown - New Orleans.

This is a great place to visit if you have 30 to 45 minutes to kill and the art gallery is absolutely free.

data.title: If you are an artist yourself....
data.text: ..... or just enjoy seeing the local art scenes wherever you are visiting, the Bossier Arts Council is a very good place to start. An an artist you can take advantage of the "Artist One Stop" they offer. You can have professional pictures take of your art, they also show you how to do it. They offer classes in grant writing, art as a business, how to get your work out there using social media, websites etc. and so much more! There is also an art gallery on site with a gift shop, so you can purchase some local art from artists and artisans living in this area. The friendly staff at  the BAC will also provide you with information about other art venues and can help fill your calendar with art related events going on all the time in this Northwest corner of Louisiana.  Plan to visit the East Bank Gallery and gift shop for sure!

data.title: Treat yourself to the Arts
data.text: Bossier Arts Council offers a unique experience for Art Lovers.  Gallery space includes an Emerging Gallery of NWLA Artists. Check the schedule for local theatre productions in the East Bank Theatre located at Bossier Arts Council.  BAC is a special treat for locals and visitors to the city.

data.title: Bossier Arts Council
data.text: Great experience in the Gallery.  This venue offers the public a free art gallery of visiting local artists.  The Eastbank theater is a part of this venue and offers a little theater experience, which a full calendar of events
